languages.text: "Это ты хотел мне сказать, идущий Путем Воина? Такими словами надеялся согреть мое сердце?" {n}Слова Ирлиэт звенят в воздухе отчаянием и презрением.{/n} "О Азуриан, и вновь твои дети стремятся унять свою гордыню, отправляя своих собратьев в миры мон-кай — за кровью и смертью!"

traits.locale_text: "Это ты хотел мне сказать, идущий Путем Война? Такими словами надеялся согреть мое сердце?" {n}Слова Ирлиэт звенят в воздухе отчаянием и презрением.{/n} "О Азуриан, и вновь твои дети стремятся унять свою гордыню, отправляя своих собратьев в миры мон-кай — за кровью и смертью!"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Is that what an adherent of the Path of the Warrior wishes to tell me? Were these words meant to comfort my heart?" {n}Yrliet's words ring with contempt and desperation.{/n} "O Asuryan, your children once again seek to appease their pride by sending their kin to mon-keigh worlds — there to find nothing but blood and death!"
languages.original_text: "Это ты хотел мне сказать, идущий Путем Воина? Такими словами надеялся согреть мое сердце?" {n}Слова Ирлиэт звенят в воздухе отчаянием и презрением.{/n} "О Азуриан, и вновь твои дети стремятся унять свою гордыню, отправляя своих собратьев в миры мон-кай — за кровью и смертью!"

traits.locale_text: "Is that what an adherent of the Path of the Warrior wishes to tell me? Were these words meant to comfort my heart?" {n}Yrliet's words ring with contempt and desperation.{/n} "O Asuryan, your children once again seek to appease their pride by sending their kin to the mon-keigh worlds for slaughter!"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Is that what an adherent of the Path of the Warrior wishes to tell me? Were these words meant to comfort my heart?" {n}Yrliet's words ring with contempt and desperation.{/n} "O Asuryan, your children once again seek to appease their pride by sending their kin to the mon-keigh worlds for slaughter!"

traits.locale_text: "Is that what an adherent of the Path of the Warrior wishes to tell me? Were these words meant to comfort my heart?" {n}Yrliet's words ring with contempt and desperation.{/n} "O Asuryan, your children once again seek to appease their pride by sending their kin to the mon-keigh worlds for slaughter!"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Is that what an adherent of the Path of the Warrior wishes to tell me? Were these words meant to comfort my heart?" {n}Yrliet's words ring with contempt and desperation.{/n} "O Asuryan, your children once again seek to appease their pride by sending their kin to mon-keigh worlds — there to find nothing but blood and death!"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Is that what an adherent of the Path of the Warrior wishes to tell me? Were these words meant to comfort my heart?" {n}Yrliet's words ring with contempt and desperation.{/n} "O Asuryan, your children once again seek to appease their pride by sending their kin to mon-keigh worlds — there to find nothing but blood and death!"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «¿Eso es lo que tiene que decirme un seguidor de la Senda del Guerrero? ¿Y se supone que mi corazón debe hallar consuelo en esas palabras?». {n}El tono de Yrliet transmite desprecio y desesperación.{/n} «¡Oh, Asuryan, una vez más tus hijos pretenden colmar su orgullo mandando a sus congéneres a los planetas de los mon-keigh, donde no encontrarán más que sangre y muerte!».
languages.original_text: "Is that what an adherent of the Path of the Warrior wishes to tell me? Were these words meant to comfort my heart?" {n}Yrliet's words ring with contempt and desperation.{/n} "O Asuryan, your children once again seek to appease their pride by sending their kin to mon-keigh worlds — there to find nothing but blood and death!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Eso es lo que tiene que decirme un seguidor de la Senda del Guerrero? ¿Y se supone que mi corazón debe hallar consuelo en esas palabras?». {n}El tono de Yrliet transmite desprecio y desesperación.{/n} «¡Oh, Asuryan, una vez más tus hijos pretenden colmar su orgullo mandando a su gente a los planetas de los mon-keigh para que la masacren!».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “这就是踏上战士道途的族人想告诉我的事情吗？你说这些话，是为了安慰我的心灵吗？”{n}伊莉耶特的语气中充满了轻蔑与绝望。{/n}“阿苏焉啊，您的子嗣由于傲慢，再次将他们的族人送往猴子的世界，踏上鲜血与死亡的道路！”
languages.original_text: "Is that what an adherent of the Path of the Warrior wishes to tell me? Were these words meant to comfort my heart?" {n}Yrliet's words ring with contempt and desperation.{/n} "O Asuryan, your children once again seek to appease their pride by sending their kin to mon-keigh worlds — there to find nothing but blood and death!"

traits.locale_text: “这就是踏上战士道途的族人想告诉我的事情吗？你说这些话，是为了安慰我的心灵吗？”{n}伊莉耶特的语气中充满了轻蔑与绝望。{/n}“阿苏焉啊，您的子嗣再次出于傲慢，将他们的族人送往猴子的世界，卷入屠杀的漩涡！”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Est-ce là ce qu'un adepte de la Voie du Guerrier souhaite me dire ? Ces paroles sont-elles censées me réconforter ? {n}demande Yrliet sur un ton à la fois méprisant et désespéré.{/n} Ô, Asuryan... Tes enfants cherchent à nouveau à satisfaire leur fierté en envoyant leurs semblables dans les mondes des mon-keigh... pour n'y trouver que sang et mort ! »
languages.original_text: "Is that what an adherent of the Path of the Warrior wishes to tell me? Were these words meant to comfort my heart?" {n}Yrliet's words ring with contempt and desperation.{/n} "O Asuryan, your children once again seek to appease their pride by sending their kin to mon-keigh worlds — there to find nothing but blood and death!"

traits.locale_text: « Est-ce là ce qu'un adepte de la Voie du Guerrier souhaite me dire ? Ces paroles sont-elles censées me réconforter ? {n}demande Yrliet sur un ton à la fois méprisant et désespéré.{/n} Ô, Asuryan... Tes enfants cherchent à nouveau à satisfaire leur fierté en envoyant leurs semblables dans les mondes des mon-keigh pour les y massacrer ! »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「戦士の道の信奉者が私に伝えたいのは、そういうことなのだろうか？この言葉は、私の心を慰めるためのものなのか？」{n}ユリエットの言葉は軽蔑と絶望に満ちている。{/n}「アシュリアンよ、お前の御子らは、またしても自分のプライドを鎮めるために、自分たちの同胞を血と死しかないモン＝ケイの世界に送って虐殺しようとしているのか！」
languages.original_text: "Is that what an adherent of the Path of the Warrior wishes to tell me? Were these words meant to comfort my heart?" {n}Yrliet's words ring with contempt and desperation.{/n} "O Asuryan, your children once again seek to appease their pride by sending their kin to mon-keigh worlds — there to find nothing but blood and death!"

traits.locale_text: 「戦士の道の信奉者が私に伝えたいのは、そういうことなのだろうか？この言葉は、私の心を慰めるためのものなのか？」{n}ユリエットの言葉は軽蔑と絶望に満ちている。{/n}「アシュリアンよ、お前の御子らは、またしても自分のプライドを鎮めるために、自分たちの同胞を血と死しかないモン＝ケイの世界に送って虐殺しようとしているのか！」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Das will ein Anhänger des Pfads des Kriegers mir also sagen? Sollten diese Worte meinem Herzen Trost spenden?" {n}In Yrliets Worten liegen Verachtung und Verzweiflung.{/n} "O Asuryan, Eure Kinder versuchen erneut, ihren Stolz zu besänftigen, indem sie ihre Sippe auf Chem-Pan-Sey-Welten schicken, wo sie nichts als Blut und Tod erwarten!"
languages.original_text: "Is that what an adherent of the Path of the Warrior wishes to tell me? Were these words meant to comfort my heart?" {n}Yrliet's words ring with contempt and desperation.{/n} "O Asuryan, your children once again seek to appease their pride by sending their kin to mon-keigh worlds — there to find nothing but blood and death!"

traits.locale_text: "Das will ein Anhänger des Pfads des Kriegers mir also sagen? Sollten diese Worte meinem Herzen Trost spenden?" {n}In Yrliets Worten liegen Verachtung und Verzweiflung.{/n} "O Asuryan, Eure Kinder versuchen erneut, ihren Stolz zu besänftigen, indem sie ihre Sippe für ein Gemetzel auf Chem-Pan-Sey-Welten schicken!"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Savaşçının Yolu taraftarının bana söylemek istediği bu mu? Bu sözlerin yüreğimi ısıtması mı gerekiyordu?" {n}Yrliet'in sözleri, horgörü ve çaresizlikle yankılanıyor.{/n} "Ey Asuryan, çocukların soydaşlarını mon-keigh dünyalarına göndererek bir kez daha kibirlerini doyurmanın peşinde. Oralarda onları kan ve ölümden başka bir şey beklemiyor!"
languages.original_text: "Is that what an adherent of the Path of the Warrior wishes to tell me? Were these words meant to comfort my heart?" {n}Yrliet's words ring with contempt and desperation.{/n} "O Asuryan, your children once again seek to appease their pride by sending their kin to mon-keigh worlds — there to find nothing but blood and death!"

traits.locale_text: "Savaşçının Yolu taraftarının bana söylemek istediği bu mu? Bu sözlerin yüreğimi ısıtması mı gerekiyordu?" {n}Yrliet'in sözleri, horgörü ve çaresizlikle yankılanıyor.{/n} "Ey Asuryan, çocukların soydaşlarını mon-keigh dünyalarına göndererek bir kez daha kibirlerini doyurmanın peşinde. Oralarda kan ve ölümden başka bir şey beklemiyor!"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
